column2: Qualification: Chartered Accountant (CA).Experience: Min 5 years Experience as CFO1. Financial Strategy:a. Develop and execute the company's financial strategy, in alignment with theoverall business goals.b. Provide leadership in accounting, financial planning, budgeting, andforecasting and other related activities.c. Formulate and implement financial policies; financial planning & analysis,budgeting and manage cash flow.2. Financial Reporting:a. Prepare and present timely and accurate financial reports, including incomestatements, balance sheets, cash flow statements, and other financialperformance indicators.3. Risk Management:a. Identify and manage financial risks, and develop risk mitigation strategies.b. Ensure compliance with legal, tax, and financial regulations.c. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to establish and maintain robust riskmanagement practices.4. Capital Management:a. Optimize the company's capital structure, making decisions about debt andequity financing, capital investments, and cash management.b. Produce and regularly update cash flow forecasts and ensure timely remittancerequests to ensure sufficient funds are available.5. Investor Relations:a. Build and maintain relationships with investors and financial institutions.b. Manage financial communications with shareholders and potential investors.c. Communicate the organization's financial performance, strategies, andfinancial outlook to shareholders and the investment community.6. Strategic Planning:a. Contribute to the development of the company's strategic plan, ensuring thatfinancial goals align with the overall mission and vision of the organization.b. Leading the controllership, FP&A (Finance Planning & Analysis) andcompliance7. Treasury Management:a. Manage cash flow, investments, and banking relationships to ensure adequateliquidity and efficient fund utilization.b. Ensure compliance with legal, financial and procurement policies for donorfunded projects.c. Manage cash flow, liquidity, and cash investments to ensure adequate fundsfor operational needs and strategic initiatives.d. Oversee debt management, including debt issuance, refinancing, andcompliance with debt covenants.e. Evaluate and execute capital market activities, such as financing options andcapital allocation strategies.8. Cost Management:a. Identify cost-saving opportunities and lead efforts to control and reduceoperational costs.b. Assist with expenditure control, ensure adherence to company policies andprocedures and advise team members on possible cost saving measures.c. Monitor the inflow and outflow of funds and ensure optimum utilization ofavailable funds towards the accomplishment of organizational goals.d. To ensure costing for product development and projects are accurate andenough support is provided to BD.9. Mergers and Acquisitions:a. Evaluate potential mergers, acquisitions, or partnerships, conducting duediligence and leading financial negotiations.b. Assess the financial impact and risks associated with M&A transactions.10. Financial Team Leadership:a. Lead and mentor the finance and accounting team, ensuring the developmentof skills and competencies within the department.b. Work with other department heads to monitor each department and makerecommendations.c. Maintaining relationships and closely working with Company's Bankingpartners for desired financial facilities and negotiating the lowest competitiverates as applicable.d. Designing, Implementation, monitoring, reporting and adherence of accountingand financial transactions at entity level.e. Understanding organizational systems, improving them and designing newones.f. Maintain relationship with regulatory and credit rating agencies as requiredfrom time to timeg. Monitor banking activities of the organization.h. Adhere to the law and company's policiesi. Overall supervision of finance and accounts team.11. Compliance:a. Ensure compliance with tax laws, regulations, and financial reportingstandards.b. Coordinate with external auditors as needed.c. Conduct audits and ensure statutory compliance as per applicable laws.d. Ensure 100% adherence to the Statutory obligations / compliance.e. Ensure 100% Tax Compliances applicable to Company and its subsidiaries, ifapplicable.f. To ensure compliance with companies Act12. Strategic Decision Support:a. Provide financial insights and analysis to support strategic decisions andbusiness growth initiatives.b. Designing and Implementation of critical MIS (Sales, Expenses, subsidiaries,supply chain, product costs etc. including TB, P&L & Balance Sheet) structureand its timely circulation to the relevant stakeholders;c. Preparation of the Annual Budgeting process. Ensure, its correctness, criticalanalysis, comparison with relevant data points and its presentation to the Sr.Management.d. Engage and collaborate with the Board and present and report accurate andtimely financial information of the company to the board and relevantstakeholders.e. Participate in developing new business and assist the CEO the drafting ofprospective budgets, identifying new funding opportunities and determining thecost-effectiveness of prospective service delivery. This will include working withother key senior persons of the organization to ensure financial and operationalsuccess through cost-benefit analysis along with compliance with all relatedrequirements.f. Work with the CEO on the long-term strategic vision of the company whichincludes fostering and cultivating stakeholder relationships across variouslevels as well as assisting in the development and negotiation of contracts13. Asset Management:a. Custodian of Fixed Asset Register and Capital projects - Budgeting, Monitoringb. Maintains office supplies inventory by checking stock to determine inventorylevel; anticipating needed supplies; evaluating new office products; placing andexpediting orders for supplies; and verifying receipt of supplies.c. Maintain records for fixed assets and Device stock log and update them on aquarterly basis14. Banking Commerciala. To ensure inventories are appropriately evaluated and slow-moving inventoriesare liquidated on time.b. To ensure all purchase payments are accurately provisioned as per CAPEXand OPEX budget.c. To ensure vendors payments rates are negotiated well. To ensure favourableDays Payment Outstandingd. To ensure Letter of Credit and Bank Guarantees are arranged on time.e. To ensure appropriate Insurance covers mitigating all possible risks and ensureInsurance premiums are negotiated.f. To ensure working capital and term loans are raised at a competitive price.g. To ensure cash flow for rolling three months are monitored on monthly basis.Competency Skills Required:Qualification: Chartered Accountant (CA).Experience: Min 5 years Experience as CFO1. Strong knowledge of financial management, budgeting, and financial analysis.2. Excellent understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.3. Demonstrated experience in strategic planning and execution.4. Strong leadership and team management skills.5. Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.6. Ability to work effectively with senior management, the Board of Directors, andexternal stakeholders.7. Proven experience as a CFO or in a senior financial leadership role.8. Possess fluent written and spoken English skills - able to translate detailedinformation into clear, concise, and accessible messaging.9. Proficient in the use of MS Office and financial management software and tools.Experience in corporate governance and good negotiable skills.

column2: A role in Enterprise Fulfillment Optimization means creating industry leading intelligence solutions to drive best in class omnichannel guest experiences at the lowest cost to Target   You will focus on enabling the future transportation operating model, optimizing inventory management, driving topology planning or leveraging deep business insights and analytics to propel Target s Supply Chain   As a network steward, we create forecasts, design inventory optimization strategies and leverage technology to ensure our inventory is available at the right time, in the right places and quantity to meet the needs of our guest, stores and operational goals   Super-powered first and foremost by our people, and supported by robust process and technology, we are a team of data-focused, curious minds who love to solve hard problems to enable a dynamic, fast paced Supply Chain Network   Our modern operating systems are built by Target and lead in the arena of automated large scale supply chain planning and optimization systems running large-scale solves for complex optimization problems   The Fulfillment Optimization team is responsible for providing insights, leading strategy and optimization based initiatives to drive the efficiency of Target s digital fulfillment.    The team member will need to use data modeling skills, statistical knowledge, simulation and modeling techniques while collaborating with data science, product, technology and business partners to transform Target s fulfillment.    As a Senior Fulfillment Optimization Manager of Fulfillment Optimization team-    You will work with operations and technology partners to analyze opportunities, quantify scope for improvement and define core areas of focus to improve guest experience and cost to fulfill digital orders in Target s supply chain.   You will build root cause analysis and reporting to provide specificity/detail in analytical output(s) to drive deep understanding of the problems/defects and action across core process teams and partners.   You will partner with product and analytical teams, digital business teams, supply chain and other operations teams globally to deliver on business outcomes like ship expense reduction, promise speed, inventory availability on digital channel for various service levels.   You will leverage data and analytics to provide competitive analysis, drive decision making, assess the health and effectiveness of digital fulfilment related PL impacts, and to deliver recommendations to key stakeholders.   It will be critical that you possess an understanding of retail, eCommerce or similar area   You will use mathematical modeling, simulation and statistical approaches to clearly define problems, build solutions and recommend next steps.    About you:    BTECH/MTECH/MS degree   5-13 years of retail or equivalent domain experience   Experience in business problem solving using analytical skills   Experience with statistical tools such as R/Python, and with scripting languages such as SQL for analyzing data and building prototypes and solutions   A strong passion for empirical research and for answering hard questions with data. Good understanding of analysis of algorithms, simulations, A/B testing, stochastic models, forecasting   Familiarity with supply chain concepts such as forecasting, planning, optimization, and logistics - gained through work experience or graduate level education.   Experience with Supply Chain or Ecommerce Order Fulfillment preferred   Ability to communicate complex concepts in easy to understand terminology with multiple audiences.   Technical aptitude and familiarity with the design and use of complex supply chain logistics software systems   Knowledge of statistics and data mining techniques and tools to analyze and make insights from big data such as historical sales data and simulation/experiment results
